function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate government interventions for revitalizing the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouragement of remote working and digital twins may lead to reduced physical interaction, impacting social and professional dynamics.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate workplace modification activities at the operational level","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substantial underestimation of infection cases in some areas during the early stage of the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of bluetooth and gps location data for contact tracing and monitoring may raise privacy concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and crowd control","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Malaria","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public education campaigns leading to the spread of disinformation and misinformation about diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of disruptions on focal organization in supply chain","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased public gatherings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of decent housing, running water, proper sanitation, and waste management systems in slum areas, increasing the threat of pandemic spread.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of criminalization of ipv in some countries","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reliance on mass drug administration mda or mass screen and treat msat approach","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the post-occupancy evaluation poe of health club facilities","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to crowded urban built environments","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases in smart cities due to lack of effective monitoring and interpretation of health-related data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of affordable housing with resilient building typologies in dense areas, leading to spatial disparities for vulnerable communities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Innovation in pervasive sensor technologies and wireless communication protocols","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of data over radio waves","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low efficiency","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality due to limited ventilation and recirculation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nanoparticle health risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and handling of masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of different sign types informal vs. professional","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close-contact aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 is likely in confined, crowded, and poorly ventilated indoor environments, increasing the risk of contagion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of widespread diseases like copd and heart failure not influencing the number of cases at an ecological level","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines during the delivery of goods and basic needs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in determining and predicting the number of infected and recovered individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed decision making and information disclosure during the early stages of an outbreak","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited network and database setups for smart cities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of well-studied learning methods","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Failure to address the self-organizing and growth limitations of the global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supply chain resilience leading to disruption in essential supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of gated communities may create a false sense of security and lead to decreased vigilance in disease prevention measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in public transport ridership","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate space planning and design in buildings can lead to inefficient utilization of space and hinder the ability to accommodate public health measures during pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respiratory droplet transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health crisis and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of indoor and outdoor conditions on influenza seasonality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of data from only 15 cities in the united states may not be representative of the entire country and may lead to biased results.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunities for pcas to capitalize on increased public support through crowdfunding and payments for ecosystem services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to uv radiation from artificial and natural sources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infection in the workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of key aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks with storing patient information in a government database","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to distancing and hygiene protocols during post-evaluation discussions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to finance for smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
